CVE-2013-7315: Vulnerability in Spring MVC in Spring Framework before 3.2.4 and 4.0.0.M1 CVE-2014-0054: Vulnerability in Spring MVC in Spring Framework before 3.2.8 and 4.0.0 before 4.0.2
